scripts.dev:main: npm run build:preload && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE= ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX=1 NODE_ENV=development npx electron dist/main/main.js --no-sandbox --disable-setuid-sandbox --disable-seccomp-filter-sandbox --disable-namespace-sandbox --disable-gpu --disable-features=VizDisplayCompositor
